Random forest is a machine learning approach based on classification and regression trees (CART; Breiman, 2001). The RF model-building process is similar to that of CART; only it combines numerous independent trees to reach a final decision (for further details, see Wiesmeier et al. (2011) and Da Silva Chagas et al. (2016)). We estimated the relative importance of each variable in the RF model using OOB randomly selected data. The mean square error (MSE) was calculated as:
